lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Initially, the ministry is likely to bar corporate and individual investors due to their relative inexperience, and to limit trading to instruments like currency, stock indexes, time deposits and government debt futures, the sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Finance Ministry is expected to allow local banks, securities houses and insurance companies to use overseas markets from this month, bond market sources said, but officials would only say the issue was under study.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Mahlmann earlier told a press conference he would visit Kyoji Kitamura, director-general of the Finance Ministry's Securities Bureau, to express the CBOT's concern that Japanese financial institutions and individuals are not permitted to trade on the CBOT.
